terms.welcome-guide:
This tool helps you search more easy image art of Albums, Movies and other multimedia elements. If they are in iTunes you will find it here!

As easy as these steps:

  1. Set in the first field the term you are looking for.
  2. Choose the type of element.
  3. (optional) change the maximum number of results.
  4. Press on the "Search" button.
